strings:
Lagom Layout Big HR/distance without icons Small battery/distance with big icons Big HR/distance with small icons Icons style Filled Outline Show battery as icon
Background Color Hours Color Minutes Color Distance Color
Basic Color(icons,date,battery) HR default Color Rest elements Date color
Orange Black Green Olive White Dark Gray Blue Red Dark Red Dark Green Dark Blue Purple Pink Yellow Light Gray
Week starts on Sunday Monday
Distance/Week Distance/Steps Distance,km/mil.(daily) Distance,km/mil.(weekly) Steps(daily) 24H format(yes: 14:15 ignore watch settings, no: watch settings) Military format, no : between hours and minutes (yes: 1415, no: 14:15) Leading Zero for Hours (yes: 09:15, no: 9:15) Band Color: Granite Blue Band Color: Berry Band Color: Sea Foam Band Color: Sandstone Band Color: Light Sand Band Color: Powder Gray Band Color: Moss(Same as Olive) Band Color: Sandstone Band Color: Cerise Band Color: Aqua Band Color: Blush Pink Band Color: Tan Suede Band Color: Dark Brown Band Color: Tan Italian Leather Band Color: Light Sand Italian Band Color: Navy Band Color: Orchid Metrics km mil Date format DAY dd.mm DAY mm.dd DAY dd/mm DAY mm/dd MM/DD/YY DD/MM/YY DD MON DD MONTH DAY dd Language English Nordic Italian Spanish Swedish German Slovak French Czech Portuguese Polish
Icon One content Icon Two content
Show Icon One Show Icon Two Show Distance Show Week Number
Is Alarm On icon Is Do Not Disturb On Unread messages on a phone Is Connected to Phone Icon Heart Rate Heart Rate Coloring(green-blue-red zones) Your age (for HR zones caclualtion) Age should be between 0 and 150 Check visual pallete at skob.io 1.Color pallete: White 2.Color pallete: Super light yellow 3.Color pallete: Light yellow 4.Color pallete: Yellow 5.Color pallete: Super light magenta
